title: My First Sale – A Dream Start for Devi Products
description: Devi Products is proud to announce a special milestone in our journey – the very first sale of our authentic Sri Lankan spices.
content:
We are delighted to announce a significant milestone in our journey – the very first sale of Devi Products.

Our founder officially launched the brand with a mission to deliver premium, authentic Sri Lankan spices to the world. The honor of being our very first customer goes to the highly respected Mr. Ranjith Premathilake, Chairman of Sanjeewaka Ayurvedic Products (Pvt.) Ltd, the visionary entrepreneur behind the globally renowned Chandanalepa Ayurveda Cosmetics.

The personal handover of our first product was more than just a sale – it was a moment of inspiration, encouragement, and validation for our team. Beginning our journey with the trust and support of such a distinguished business leader strengthens our dedication to uphold the values of authenticity, quality, and trust in every product we deliver.

This milestone also symbolizes the start of a journey to connect Sri Lankan farmers, traditional spice cultivation methods, and modern consumers through a brand that values sustainability, ethical sourcing, and premium quality.

With this first sale, Devi Products embarks on an exciting journey to bring the richness of Sri Lankan spices to kitchens everywhere, while continually innovating, growing, and building meaningful relationships with partners and customers alike. This is only the beginning, and we are committed to making every product a testament to the heritage and excellence of Sri Lanka’s spice industry.

title: Devi Spices Shines at Veyangoda Monthly Food Event
description: Devi Spices proudly participated in the lively monthly food event near St. Mary’s College in Veyangoda, showcasing our complete range of authentic Sri Lankan spices to the community.
content:
Devi Spices had the wonderful opportunity to participate in the vibrant monthly food event organized by the community near St. Mary’s College in Veyangoda. As one of the featured spice sellers, we presented our full range of premium Sri Lankan spices, allowing visitors to explore and experience the authentic flavors of our products.

The event was fun, interactive, and full of energy, bringing together food lovers, families, and local vendors. Our team loved engaging with the attendees, sharing tips on using spices in traditional Sri Lankan cooking, and receiving valuable feedback on our products. Events like these are not only a chance to showcase our spices but also an opportunity to connect directly with the community and celebrate the rich culinary heritage of Sri Lanka.

title: Devi Products at the Trace City Expert in Colombo
description: Devi Spices had the distinct honor of introducing our product line to the highly respected Mr. Fayaz Hudah, Programme Head at the ICT Agency of Sri Lanka (ICTA), at a recent event held at Trace City. During our discussion, we also shared details about Devi Products and the business vision behind it. Mr. Hudah graciously encouraged our new business initiative, offering his kind support and inspiration. This was not only an introduction of our products but also an invaluable opportunity to connect with one of Sri Lanka’s most esteemed leaders in technology and entrepreneurship.
content:
Devi Spices recently had the immense privilege of meeting the highly respected Mr. Fayaz Hudah, a visionary leader in Sri Lanka’s technology and innovation ecosystem. Mr. Hudah serves as the Programme Head at the ICT Agency of Sri Lanka (ICTA), a pivotal government entity driving the nation’s digital and IT development.

Mr. Hudah's remarkable influence extends far beyond ICTA. He is the esteemed founder of 'Spiralation,' Sri Lanka’s first-ever technology accelerator, which has played a vital role in fostering a thriving ecosystem for tech-based businesses across sectors such as digital health, logistics, and financial services.

At the event in Trace City, a hub for innovation and entrepreneurship, we were truly honored to personally introduce our Devi Spices to Mr. Hudah. Alongside our product line, we shared the vision of Devi Products and our plans for growth. This meeting was more than just a product introduction; it symbolized a meaningful bridge between Sri Lanka's rich agricultural heritage and its leading-edge technology community.

We were deeply inspired by Mr. Hudah's kind encouragement and unwavering support for our new business initiative. His guidance and recognition were invaluable, motivating us to continue striving for excellence. Sharing our commitment to quality and our goal of bringing traditional Sri Lankan spices to a wider, digitally-connected market with such an esteemed leader was an unforgettable experience.
